spawn.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to make a series of things happen or start to exist
spawn.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: New technology has spawned new business opportunities.
spawn.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: if a fish or frog spawns, it produces eggs in large quantities at the same time
spawn.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: the eggs of a fish or frog laid together in a soft mass
